maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/448/setti.orig: Lea, not this way. Head to the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0], quickly!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/448/setti.text: Lea, pas par là. Va vers le \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0], vite !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/448/setti.orig: The tour does not include the river area. We've been there yesterday already.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/448/setti.text: La visite n'inclus pas le tour de la rivière. On est déjà venu ici hier.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/450/setti.orig: Lea, not this way. Head to the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0], quickly!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/450/setti.text: Lea, pas par là. Va vers le \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0], vite !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/451/setti.orig: Lea, not this way. Head to the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0], quickly!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/451/setti.text: Lea, pas par là. Va vers le \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0], vite !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/456/setti.text: Localisation des Cibles dans la Zone.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/501/setti.orig: So we're just out of town and oh look!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/501/setti.text: Donc, nous venons juste de quitter la ville et regardez ça !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/501/setti.orig: Yet the almighty plot decided we're not ready to proceed, so these things remain unresponsive.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/501/setti.text: Hélas, l'intrigue toute puissante a décidé que nous ne pouvions pas continuer, c'est pourquoi ce machin ne réagira pas.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/501/setti.orig: Nothing to do here, so let's appreciate the amazing nature of this place.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/501/setti.text: Il n'y a plus rien à faire ici, mis à part contempler ce paysage époustouflant.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/501/setti.orig: Talk to Lukas in \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - Crimson Lake\c[0] to proceed with his tour.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/501/setti.text: Parlez à Lukas dans au \c[3]Lac Pourpre à \v[area.arid.name]\c[0] pour continuer sa visite.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/502/setti.orig: Because it's filled with water...\. or whatever that purple stuff is.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/502/setti.text: Parce qu'il est rempli d'eau...\. ou de ce truc violet en tout cas, peu importe ce que c'est.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/502/setti.orig: Sorry, this tour doesn't include basic scientific explanations.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/502/setti.text: Désolé, cette visite n'inclus pas d'explications scientifiques de bases.
Gyahahaha, quel client difficile vous faites !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/502/setti.orig: I'm sure Tronny would have a good explanation for you.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/502/setti.text: Je suis sûr que Tronny aurait une bonne explication pour toi.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/502/setti.orig: Aaaand he'd probably also complain about those weird rock formations.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/502/setti.text: Eeet il râlerait probablement que ces formations rocheuses sont un peu curieuses.
Je vous propose de continuer. Vers le \c[3]Nord\c[0] !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/502/setti.orig: Be careful not to step on a virus along the way!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/502/setti.text: Faites attention à ne pas marcher sur un virus sur le chemin !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/502/setti.orig: Head to the north from \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - Crimson Lake\c[0] to proceed with Lukas' tour.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/502/setti.text: Allez au nord du \c[3]Lac Pourpre de \v[area.arid.name]\c[0] pour continuer la visite avec Lukas.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/503/setti.orig: Alright, our final sight will be further to the \c[3]west\c[0]!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/503/setti.text: Donc, notre dernière étape sera encore plus à l'\c[3]ouest\c[0] !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/503/setti.orig: Head to the west from \c[3]Vermillion Wasteland - Crimson Lake\c[0] to proceed with Lukas' tour.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/503/setti.text: Allez à l'ouest du \c[3]Lac Pourpre de \v[area.arid.name]\c[0] pour continuer la visite avec Lukas.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/504/setti.orig: You're so quiet today...\. even for your standards.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/504/setti.text: Tu es bien silencieuse aujourd'hui...\. encore plus que d'habitude.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: The view here isn't all that bad, hm?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: La vue ici n'est pas si mal, hein ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: Okay, look...\. I can't keep watching you like this.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Écoute, Lea...\. Je ne peux pas te laisser dans cet état-là.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: There must be a way to help you out of this.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Il y a forcément un moyen pour t'aider à aller mieux.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: We gotta try to talk about this. Somehow.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Il faut qu'on essaye d'en parler. Je ne sais pas comment.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: I'll just ask some questions, ok?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Je vais juste poser quelques questions, OK ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: [acquiesce]
OK, voyons voir...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: Okay, let's see...
I suppose you remembered something about yourself... Something that made you sad?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: J'imagine que tu t'es souvenue de quelque chose sur toi... quelque chose qui te rend triste ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: Okay, so what could it be?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: OK, qu'est-ce que ça peut bien être ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: Did you...\. lose somebody dear to you?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Est-ce que...\. tu as perdu un être cher ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: [shakes head]
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: Hm...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Hm...

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: Did somebody...\. betray you?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Est-ce que quelqu'un...\. t'as trahi ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: Oh...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Oh...

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: I'm sorry to hear that...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Je suis désolé d'entendre ça...

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: Just what did this person exactly do to you...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Hum... qu'est-ce que cette personne a bien pu te faire exactement...

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: Are all your troubles... because of that person?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Et tous tes problèmes... viennent de cette personne ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: [shakes head]
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: So there is something else?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Donc il y a autre chose ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: Man, this is hard.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Et ben, c'est difficile.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: I wonder how the others are doing.\. Hlin, Buggy, Emilie...\. all of them.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Je me demande ce que les autres font.\. Hlin, Buggy, Emilie...\. Toute la troupe.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: It seemed like you got along quite well with Emilie and Tronny, didn't you?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Tu avais l'air d'assez bien t'entendre avec Emilie et Tronny, non ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: So...\. I'm sure we'll be missed.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Donc...\. je suis sûr qu'on doit leur manquer.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: In difficult times like these...\. it's good to know there are people out there that care for you.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Dans des temps difficiles comme ceux-là...\. Ça fait du bien de savoir qu'il y a des gens en dehors qui se font du souci pour nous.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: Even though it looks like we're on our own for now.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Même si en ce moment on dirait qu'on est tout seuls.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: I think it's probably better if we call it a day.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Je pense que ce serait mieux que l'on s'arrête là pour aujourd'hui.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: Let's finish the trial building tomorrow, okay?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: On finira le bâtiment d'épreuve demain, OK ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: Alright then, back to the dormitory.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Bon, alors retournons au dortoir.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.orig: You decided to call it a day and head back to the \c[3]Dormitory\c[0].
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/511/setti.text: Vous avez décidé que c'était tout pour aujourd'hui et de revenir au \c[3]Dortoir\c[0].

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Beating up that Rhino-thing just to see such a place, I can't believe it.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: J'y crois pas ! On fait des pieds et les mains pour battre cette espèce de rhinocéros, et notre seule récompense, c'est de voir cette pièce.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: How the hell do they even know what my room looks like?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Comment ils ont bien pu savoir à quoi ressemble ma chambre ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: And why would they put that kind of reconstruction in this place?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Et pourquoi est-ce qu'il fallait qu'ils la reconstituent ici ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Anyway... I seem to remember a little more now.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Sinon... Je me souviens d'un peu plus de chose maintenant.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Like the place I live at...\. the place I work at...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: De là où je vis...\. de là où je travaille...

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: What was the name of the company again?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: C'était quoi déjà le nom de la boîte ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Anyway, I think I worked in the IT department...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: En tout cas, je crois que je bossais dans le département informatique...

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Still... this all feels very strange.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Mais bon... Tout ça me parait encore bien étrange.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Like...\. why did I forget all of this suddenly?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Genre...\. pourquoi j'ai oublié tout ça aussi soudainement ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: You know... I had a... pretty scary thought.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Tu sais... J'ai eu une idée assez... effrayante.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: I'm spending all of my time in this game now....
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Je passe tout mon temps dans ce jeu maintenant...

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: The only thing left from my "real life" are those memories that are slowly returning.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Les seules choses qui restent de ma "vie réelle", c'est ces souvenirs qui reviennent lentement.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: But what...\. what if there is no real life anymore?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Mais si...\. Si c'était la vie réelle qui n'existait plus ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: What if we're just stuck in this game, forever?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Et si jamais on était coincés dans ce jeu pour toujours ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Is...\. is this maybe the feeling you had yesterday?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: C'est...\. c'est peut-être le sentiment que tu as eue hier ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: I see...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Je vois...

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Well...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Bon...
Mais bon, au final...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Here's the thing, though...
Why does it matter?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Pourquoi est-ce important ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Does that make our lives any less meaningful?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Est-ce que cela donne moins de sens à notre vie ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: We don't know why we're stuck in this game...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: On ne sait pas pourquoi on est coincé dans ce jeu...
Mais, honnêtement...\. on ne sait même pas non plus pourquoi on vit, au départ.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: But, honestly...\. we don't even know why we live in the first place.
So we're either stuck in this game or stuck in "real life". What's the big difference?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Donc être coincé dans ce jeu ou être coincé dans la "vie réelle", quelle différence ça fait ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Is it so strange thinking that way?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Est-ce que c'est si absurde de penser comme ça ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Oh well...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Eh bien...

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: I think what's important... is that it's a life worth living.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Je pense que ce qui est important... c'est que cette vie vaut la peine d'être vécue.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: And being stuck in this game isn't the worst fate imaginable, now is it?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Et être coincé dans ce jeu, ce n'est pas le destin le plus tragique non plus, non ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: We're not alone. We have friends in this world.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Nous ne sommes pas tout seuls. Nous avons des amis dans ce monde.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: And heck, I know a few people that would be happy being logged into CrossWorlds permanently.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Et bon sang, j'en connais certains qui seraient heureux d'être en permanence connecté à CrossWorlds.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: So it's not all bad, is it?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Donc tout n'est pas si mal, non ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Especially if we get out of this place. This place kinda sucks, honestly.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Surtout si on arrive à partir d'ici. Cet endroit est vraiment nul, très honnêtement.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Now that I think about it, my room fits in pretty well...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Maintenant que j'y pense, ma chambre est bien à sa place ici...

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Gyahahahahaha!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Gyahahahahaha !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Well then!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Bon !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: Let's hand in that quest already!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: Allons terminer cette quête à la fin !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.orig: [nods]
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/512/setti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/524/setti.text: Rien... Je fais juste une pause.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/524/setti.orig: Already? We just started the quest! We still gotta go to the forest!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/524/setti.text: Déjà ? On vient juste de commencer cette quête ! Il faut encore qu'on aille dans la forêt !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/524/setti.orig: So you got the quest for the second trial building already?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/524/setti.text: Donc vous avez déjà la quête pour le deuxième bâtiment d'épreuve ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/524/setti.orig: Yes, finally! That really took some time. I was bored senseless yesterday!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/524/setti.text: Oui, enfin ! Ça a pris beaucoup de temps. Je m'ennuyais à mort hier !
Ça on peut le dire très fort !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/524/setti.orig: No quest for us today, so all we can do is have a look around.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/524/setti.text: Nous on a pas de quête pour aujourd'hui, donc tout ce qu'on peut faire d'autre, c'est se balader.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/524/setti.orig: I'm sure the quest will be there for you soon as well.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/524/setti.text: Mais je suis sûr que vous l'aurez bientôt vous aussi.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/527/setti.orig: Mon dieu, what are those... robot thingies?!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/527/setti.text: Mon dieu, c'est quoi ces... machins robots ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/527/setti.orig: The barriers are connected to those enemies, we need to get rid of them to proceed!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/527/setti.text: Les barrières sont connectées à ces ennemis, il faut s'en débarrasser si on veut continuer !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/537/setti.text: En avant, vers le \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0] !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/540/setti.orig: Look! It's one of those... Evotars!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/540/setti.text: Hé, regardez ! C'est un de ces... Évotars !
Hé, toi ! Tu devrais aller au Carrefour des Quêtes !
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/540/setti.orig: Hey, you! You should go to the quest hub!
Uhm...\. They got amazing loot there!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/540/setti.text: Heu...\. Ils ont mis du super loot là-bas !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/540/setti.orig: Go there if you want to get out of here!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/540/setti.text: Va là-bas si tu veux sortir d'ici !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/540/setti.orig: Quick, there's just this one chance!
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/540/setti.text: Grouille-toi, c'est une chance qu'il ne faut pas rater !
V-Vraiment ?\. Carrefour des Quêtes, tu dis ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.orig: Now that you've gathered the Evotars, what's next?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.text: Maintenant que tu as rassemblé tous les Évotars, c'est quoi la suite ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.orig: I have to get in touch with Instatainment and explain the whole situation.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.text: Il faut que j'entre en contact avec Instatainment et que je leur explique toute la situation.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.orig: And hopefully we will be able to create a proper future for Evotars that way.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.text: Et, je l'espère, comme ça on pourra envisager que les Évotars puissent avoir un futur.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.orig: So...\. what will happen with Lea now?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.text: Et...\. que va devenir Lea maintenant ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.orig: I am afraid I cannot afford to keep her in the game for much longer.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.text: Je crains que je ne puisse pas me permettre de la garder dans le jeu plus longtemps.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.orig: I am not allowed to do that in the first place...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.text: Déjà que je n'avais pas la permission de l'introduire dans le jeu au départ...

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.orig: And I really should not break company rules while I try to discuss the matter with them.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.text: Et il faudrait pas que j'enfreigne les règles pendant que j'essaye de trouver un accord avec eux.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.orig: But...\. there is no need to log her out right away, non?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.text: Mais...\. tu n'as pas besoin de la déconnecter tout de suite, hein ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.orig: We can at least play together for a little longer, oui?
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.text: On peut bien continuer à jouer ensemble un petit peu plus longtemps, oui ?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.orig: I suppose... there is no reason to rush things now.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.text: J'imagine... qu'il n'y a aucune raison de se presser.

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.orig: What are we waiting for, then?

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.text: Allons vers le Terrain de Jeu !

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.orig:
It all began when I set out\.
to find my long-lost colleagues.\.
\.
My old friends...
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/547/setti.text:
Tout a commencé, lorsque j'ai voulu\.
retrouver mes anciens collègues perdus.\.
\.
Mes vieux amis...

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/550/setti.note: end credit cutscene, responding to schneider2 earlier, saying he would complain. major story revelation (and troll)

maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/550/setti.orig: Those cliffs really do not make any sense.
maps/arid/lake-1.json/entities/550/setti.text: Ces falaises n'ont vraiment aucun sens.
